values.title: Mission
values.description: To inspire and empower business owners and talented individuals by providing comprehensive business support that leverages technology, resources, and networking.

values.title: Vision 2035
values.description: To become the leading accelerator in Ghana, fostering over 10,000 success stories of incubated and accelerated businesses, and providing innovative growth opportunities across Africa.
